summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/buidlguidl-v3 in May 2025

- **Feature Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #129 to disable write functionality, enhancing user experience by showing a notification banner.

- **Issues Closed:**
  - Closed Issue #128 to disable batch management, ensuring the workflow relies solely on the SREv2 database.
  - Closed Issue #127 to either hide location data or update it using SREv2, streamlining data presentation.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on refining user interface and data management by limiting unnecessary features and aligning with SREv2 standards.

topIssues.title: Disable batch management once the workflow is fully working on SREv2
Hide location or use SREv2 location data
